def main():
    n = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split(" ")))
    a = [0 for i in range(n)]
    a[0] = b[0]
    a[n-1] = b[n-2]
    for i in range(1,n-1):
        a[i] = min(b[i-1], b[i])
    print(sum(a))

main()
